His family goal is to educate his children and hopes to buy more land to grow crops in the future. Apollo needs the loan to buy maize to plant.

loans.use: to buy maize to plant.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is a 45 year old mother from Vihiga town and is married to Leonard and they have five school-going children.

Julia operates a cafeteria business whereby she cooks food and sells to her customers. She has been in this business for the last 13 years and makes a monthly income of KES 12,000.

She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy foodstuff, like sugar, wheat, flour, and soft drinks. Her profits will be used to repay the loan. Her dream is to grow her business through KADET's loan.

loans.use: To buy foodstuff, such as sugar, wheat, flour and soft drinks.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a 54-year-old business lady.  She is married to Charles, a businessman.  They are blessed with three children.  She has been selling cereals for the past six years and earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD, after learning about KADET from a staff member.  Alice will use the loan to buy dry maize and beans to sell in her business. 

With the anticipated profit generated from the loan, she will educate her children. Alice hopes and dreams to buy a piece of land and build a store from which to sell her grains.

loans.use: to buy dry maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Justus

texts.en: Justus is 48 years old and married with six children, living in Hioma,Uganda. He is a pastor and has been in service for over 20 years. His family goal is to educate his children and set up an income generating activity. Justus needs a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 42-year-old a business lady. She is married to James, a business man. They are blessed with three children. She has been selling second hand clothes for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan term from KADET LTD after being introduced to KADET by an existing customer. Elizabeth will use the loan to buy stock of clothes for sale. 

With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to rent a house and sell her clothes without having to displace herself.

loans.use: To buy stock of clothes for sale.

loans.name: Binh

texts.en:
Binh is 39 years old and single. She lives with her mother in Ho Chi Minh City.

She runs a small store selling many kinds of food such as dumplings, cakes, and steamed rice with green beans, in front of her house. She has been in this business for eight years.

Binh is seeking a loan to purchase foodstuffs to increase the variety of her products for sale. This will allow her to increase her monthly profit and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase foodstuffs to increase the variety of her products for sale.

loans.name: Hue

texts.en:
Hue is 51 years old.  She is a widow and has one son.  She lives with her son in Ho Chi Minh City.

She supports her family with the income she earns from her general store, which is located in front of the door of her house.  She intends to use her loan to buy more products such as beverages, coffee, milk, sugar and spices to sell to her customers.

Hue hopes her business runs smoothly and enables her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy more products such as beverages, coffee, milk, sugar and spices to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Bernard is 24 years old and he is married to Gedrine.  They are blessed with two children, one is two years old and the other is eight months old.  

He owns a bread depot and has been supplying bread for six years.  He earns a monthly income of 30,000 KES and has requested a loan of 35,000 KES in order to buy bread, cakes and cookies to sell. This is his first loan.

The profit he earns from his business will help him educate his children.

loans.use: to buy bread, cakes and cookies to sell.

loans.name: Mamatkadir

texts.ru: Маматкадир проживает в Яванском районе. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его дети находятся на заработках в России. Сам Маматкадир разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Он берет кредит для закупа бычка.
texts.en: Mamatkadir lives in the Yavan district.  He is 56 years old, married and has four children.  His children are working in Russia.  Mamatkadir breeds cattle for future sale.  He is requesting this loan to purchase a bull.

loans.use: to purchase a bull

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is a 45-year-old married woman with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works in the construction field.

Huong has run a general store in front of her house for the past 15 years. She sells instant food, basic goods, and personal items for people in her community.

She would like to receive a loan to expand her business by purchasing different kinds of products, such as cooking oil, seasoning powder, and sauce. She hopes that this will enable her to increase the turnover of her business, earn a higher income, and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to expand her business by purchasing different kinds of products, such as cooking oil, seasoning powder, and sauce

loans.name: Bong

texts.en:
Bong is a 46-year-old married woman with three children--one son and two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a cook.

For the past four years, she has run a food stall to cover family living expenses. She sells meals to people in her community. The business is going smoothly, and she would like a loan to buy new furniture, bowls, and chopsticks, and better quality food to provide to her customers.

She hopes this will increase her income, help her to improve her living conditions, and allow her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: to buy new furniture, bowls, and chopsticks, and better quality food to provide to her customers

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 41 años, vive sola en su propia casa ubicada en la comunidad de Canal donde espera tener una buena calidad de vida en el lapso del tiempo. Juana, es una mujer soltera  mayormente se dedica al trabajo en su chacra, terreno que con gran sacrificio llegó a conseguirlo  durante estos 25 años. Hoy gracias a la actividad que realiza llegó  a tener su propio campo de cultivo con plantas de café que ahora le resultan muy productivas. Juana comenta que también tiene dificultades en los tiempos de lluvia ya que aparece insectos que dañan su producción y no cuenta con apoyo económico para resolver esos problemas; es por eso que acude a los préstamos que ofrece MFP para que le ayuden con sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito numero 01 con MFP, se siente agradecida por la confianza que le dan; asimismo agradece a su banco comunal por dejarles trabajar junto a ellos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará productos químicos para que pueda eliminar las plaga que perjudican sus plantas de cacao.
texts.en: Juana, 41, lives alone in her own house in Canal where she is hoping to have a good quality of life in time.  Juana is a single woman principally working on her farm, land that she was able to get with great sacrifice over these last 25 years.  Now, thanks to the work that she does, she has her own land with coffee plants that are very productive.  Juana says that she also has problems in the rainy season since that is when destructive insects appear that hurt her crops, and she doesn't have the financial capacity to resolve these issues.  That is why she is asking for the loan that MFP offers to help with her business plans.  This will be her first loan with MFP, and she feels grateful for the trust given her.  She also thanks the communal bank for letting her work with them.  She will use the 1500 new sols to buy chemical products so that she can get rid of the infestation that hurts her cacao plants.

loans.use: to buy chemical products

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma de 37 años, está casada con Julio, con quien tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 9 años. Ella vive con su familia en una casa propia, en el distrito y provincia de Chanchamayo. Norma es una mujer que le agrada el trabajo del campo. A sus 20 años aprendió a ser independiente, y con la ayuda de su esposo pudieron cultivar y producir frutos en 3 cuadras o parcelas de terrenos. Es así que, cultiva café, plátanos y paltas. El café es su producto bandera, del que obtiene más ingresos, pero son anuales. Los plátanos le dan la seguridad de solventar sus necesidades por generarle ingresos semanales. Pero con las paltas puede darse algunos gustos. “Cada vez que cosecho vendo de 10 a 12 jabas, cada una la vendo a 12 soles”, afirma. Por su parte, Julio trabaja en una empresa privada de donde genera ingresos mensuales fijos. Se siente contenta de su trabajo, ya que, gracias a su esfuerzo puede mantener y educar a sus hijos. Una de sus metas más cercanas es adquirir otra parcela de terrenos para ampliar su producción de café. Sería la primera vez que Norma accedería a un préstamo de MFP, se siente contenta de formar parte de un banco comunal al que denominaron “Virgen del Carmen”. Da su palabra de pagar puntualmente las cuotas, si gracias a su ayuda, obtiene el préstamo. Con el dinero del crédito podrá contratar al personal necesario para limpiar sus sembríos de café. Ella paga 30 soles al día por cada personal. Afirma que es una de las mayores inversiones dentro del trabajo del campo.
texts.en:
Norma, 37, is married to Julio,with whom she has two sons aged 13 and 9.  Norma lives with her family in a home in the district and province of  Chanchamayo. Norma is a woman who likes field work. At 20 she learned to be independent, and with the help of her husband was able to grow and produce fruit in 3 blocks or parcels of land.

Thus, she grows coffee, bananas and avocados. Coffee is her flagship product, which gets more revenue, but it's an annual crop. Bananas give security to solve her need for high revenue each week. But avocados may be what some tastes prefer. "Every time I harvest, I sell 10 to 12 crates, each selling for 12 soles," she says. Meanwhile, Julio works at a private company which generates a fixed monthly income. He feels happy to work, because thanks to his effort he can support and educate their children. One of Norma's short term goals is to acquire another plot of land to expand her production of coffee. 

This would be the first time that Norma would agree to a loan from MFP.  She is happy to be part of a community bank which they called "Virgen del Carmen".  Norma gives her word of providing timely payment of fees, if thanks to your help, she gets the loan.  With the loan, she can hire the necessary laborers to clean her coffee crops. Norma pays 30 soles per day for each worker. She claims to be one of the largest investors in field work.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Oulimata

texts.fr: Oulimata est une commerçante qui vendait des vêtements.Elle a arrêté cette activité pour mieux superviser les travaux de construction de sa maison.Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants dont les 2 sont des élèves. Elle sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter des carreaux. Son ambition est de relancer son commerce et de faire de l'import - export.
texts.en: Oulimata is a merchant who used to sell clothing.  She stopped this work in order to better supervise the construction of her house.  She is married and the mother of three children, two of whom are students. She is requesting a loan of 400000f to buy tiles. Her goal is to restart her business and get involved with import-export.

loans.use: to buy tiles.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es: Gustavo es un empresario de la microempresa que tiene 56 años de edad; él es el propietario de una panadería ubicada  en el municipio de Soledad, que inició desde hace menos de dos años. Entre su clientela están los colegios, a quienes les suministran productos de cafetería, que consumen sus  estudiantes, tiendas, graneros y diversos negocios, también ofrece directamente víveres y abarrotes y para estos productos sus principales compradoras son las amas de casa, en su negocio trabaja con  2 empleados, maneja sus ventas de contado así como sus compras; cada día su negocio crece y su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente para poder comprar en mayor volumen y responder a sus clientes. Su mayor sueño es tener sucursales a nivel local y departamental. Por eso permanentemente invierte su dinero no solo en su panadería, sino también en animales para negociarlos y más adelante lograr mayores ingresos. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará harina chocolate, Arequipe, vitina levadura etc. para preparar alimentos derivados de la harina   lo que agrada mucho a sus clientes,  que consumen los deliciosos panes calientes como los vende Gustavo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Gustavo is 56, and the owner of a store, a bakery located in the municipality of Soledad that he started a year ago. His biggest customers are the schools, to which he supplies cafeteria products for the students. Also among his customers are grocery stores, and various other stores and companies. He also sells foodstuffs and groceries directly, and his main buyers are housewives. 

He sells and purchases on a cash basis. but he must hope to sell in order to invest again. His business grows each day, and his working capital becomes insufficient for being able to buy in greater volume and supply his business.

His greatest dream is to have branch stores at the local and regional level. That's why he invests in his business, in order to someday achieve his goals. 

His credikiva is the first loan that he is taking out with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will use to buy flour, chocolate, Arequipe (sweetened milk sauce), margarine, yeast, etc.

With his investment he plans to make desserts and cakes; and meet the demand for bread, and other baked goods made with wheat flour, as these are products his customers eat. For them it is a treat to get them fresh, and to eat oven-warm bread, as Gustavo sells it in his business.

loans.use: To buy flour, chocolate, Arequipe (sweetened milk sauce), margarine, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es: Eulogia, de 31 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Moisés su esposo desde hace 6 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos todos ellos menores. En unión familiar viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jatumpampa. Hace 3 años ella comenzó a incursionar en la agricultura. Pues antes solo era peón y trabajaba para otros. Nunca le gusto quedarse, sabe que tiene un camino largo por recoger, ella desea tener varias parcelas donde sembrar sus cultivos, animales y una producción a gran escala. Su mirada tímida es sinónimo de sabiduría. Ahora siembra papa y olluco en terrenos arrendados, donde paga el alquilar al año, de esa manera no se preocupa en los gastos mensualmente. Además aprovecha la experiencia de su esposo, quien conoce los proveedores de papa en la ciudad de Huancayo una de las más grandes del país. Donde vende su cosecha integra, ganando buena suma de dinero, sabe que las ganancias que obtiene son eventuales, por eso está planeando incursionar en la compra y venta de animales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Eulogía de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
Eulogia, 31, is a modest woman.  She lives with Moisés, her husband of six years.  Together they have three children, all minors.  As a family they live in their own house in the community of Jatumpampa.

Three years ago she began to venture into agriculture.  Before she was only a farmworker and she worked for other people.  She never liked to stay; she knows she has a long road to travel.  She wants to have various plots of land for planting her crops, for animals, and for a large-scale production.

Her shy eyes are synonymous with wisdom.  Now she grows potatoes and "olluco" [an Andean tuber] on rented land, where she pays the rent annually so she does not worry about monthly expenses.  She also makes the most of the experience of her husband, who knows the potato suppliers in the city of Huancayo, one of the largest in the country, where she sells her entire harvest and earns a good sum of money.  She knows the profits she gets are contingent, so she is planning to get into buying and selling animals.

She belongs to Jatumpampa al Progreso Communal Bank, and this is her fourth loan with MFP, for which she hopes for your collaboration so she can realize her plans.  On the other hand she promises to make her payments on time.  Also, she likes being part of her bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

If she receives her support, Eulogia will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizers to spread on her potato plants.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen, de 23 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Raúl, con quien convive desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Raúl y Camila, a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo de Jatumpampa. Su esposo la visita al mes, pues trabaja en una fábrica de confección de Chompas de lana en Lima, la capital del país. Es por ello que asume la responsabilidad de sus sembríos ella misma, sabe que es difícil tener que enfrentar esas dificultades, pero no se desanima. Al contrario, cuenta que ya tiene mucha experiencia. Hace 3 años comenzó a sembrar papa y alverja en terrenos alquilados. Desde la mañana sale a trabajar en sus sembríos para mantenerlos sanos y  saludables, “no cuento con peones, ya que es caro pagar su sueldo, por ello trabajo sola todos los días”, comenta. En cada cosecha ya tiene compradores fijos, quienes le comprar a buen precio. Por ello pudo comprarse un toro, espera ahorrar y de esa manera obtener uno más para poder arar la tierra y brindar ese servicio a los agricultores que no tienen. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Carmen de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus sembríos de papa y habas.
texts.en:
Carmen, 23, is a hard-working woman who lives with her common-law husband of three years, Raúl.  They have two children, Raúl and Camila, who they care for in their own house in the Jatumpampa annex.  Her husband visits her every month since he works in a wool sweater factory in the capital city, Lima.  So she assumes the responsibility of caring for the crops even though she must face difficulties.  But this does not get her down, on the contrary, as she has much experience.  She started growing potatoes and peas three years ago on rented land.  In the morning she goes out to care for her crops to keep them healthy, "I do not have hired help since it is expensive, so I work alone every day.", she says.  For every harvest she has fixed customers who buy her produce for a good price.  This has allowed her to buy an ox and she is hoping to save to buy another one to plough the land and offer this service to farmers who need it.  

She belongs to the communal bank "Jatumpampa al Progreso" and this is her fourth loan through MFP.  She is counting on you to help her meet her goals.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time and enjoys being a part of the association because all the members are responsible, supportive people.

Carmen plans to use the loan to buy natural fertilizer for her potato and lima bean crops.

loans.use: To buy natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es: Flora, de 21 años es una joven admirable. Vive en compañía de sus padres y su hermano Marvin al que apoya en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jatumpampa. Hace 3 años comenzó a sembrar de forma independiente, pues consideró que aprendió lo necesario de sus padres. Desde entonces alquila terrenos agrícolas en onde siembra papa, olluco y alverja. Los que cuida con mucha dedicación y esfuerzo. Pues es importante arrancar la maleza que crece entre los surcos, además de fertilizar y regar, de eso depende mucho la calidad de los alimentos, comenta. A pesar de su corta edad, tiene mucha inteligencia y suerte en los negocios. Viaja ella misma llevando su cosecha a la capital del país, donde vende sus alimentos a los comerciantes mayoristas que ya la conocen. Asimismo cría vacas y cerdos que enseba para luego venderlos, ahí obtiene buenas ganancias. Ahora planea ahorrar, pues quiere estudiar y ser una mujer profesional. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Flora de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para distribuirlos entre sus cultivos de papa que hace poco sembró.
texts.en:
21-year-old Flora is an admirable young woman.  She lives together with her parents and her brother Marvin who she supports.  They live in their own home, in the town of Jutumpampa.  Three years ago, Flora started sowing crops independently as she believed that she had learned what she needed to learn from her parents.  Since then she has been renting farmland where she sows potatoes, olluco (a native tuber) and peas.  She cares for her crops with a lot of commitment and hard work.  It is important to get rid of the weeds that grow between the furrows.  It is also important to fertilize and irrigate as the quality of her crops really depends on this.  In spite of her short age, Flora is very intelligent and lucky in business.  She travels to the capital city with her crops herself and sells them to wholesale buyers who know her.  She also raises cows and pigs which she fattens and then sells.  This makes her good profits.  Now she plans to save up as she would like to study and become a professional. 

Flora belongs to the "Jatumpampa al Progreso" community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can carry out her plans.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, Flora will invest the money she has requested in buying natural fertilizers for her potato crops that she has just sown.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es: Angélica, de 23 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en concubinato con Jhonatan, su esposo desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen una hija Nayeli a la que cuidan en una casa alquilada, ubicada en el anexo de Jatumpampa.  Todavía no tiene terrenos agrícolas propios, pero ya se encuentra ahorrando lo poco que tienen para comprar uno y progresar. La actividad que desarrolla es la agricultura, siembra papa, su principal producción, pues según afirma es el alimento que se consume a diario y en donde no hay pierde. Todos los días desde los primeros rayos de sol, se dirige a los campos de sembrío. Donde fertiliza, poda y riega. A veces cuida otros sembríos de esa manera le pagan un poco más y puede brindar el apoyo económico a su familia que tanto lo necesita. Cada cosecha viaja a la ciudad de Huancayo junto a su esposo, quien comercializa sus alimentos en el principal mercado de abastos. Por su parte su esposo trabaja como peón en diversos sembríos, ganado así un dinero extra. Ahora ellos planean incursionar en el negocio de compra y venta de animales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Angélica de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus sembríos de papa de la variedad “blanca y Huairo”.
texts.en:
23-year-old Angelina is a hard-working woman who lives together with Jhonatan, her husband of Three years.  The couple have a daughter, Nayeli, who they care for in a rental house, in the small village of Jatumpampa.  Angelina still does not own her own farmland but she is saving up the little that she has to buy a plot and make progress.  Her business is farming.  She sows potatoes which is her main production because, as she says, it is the food that people eat every day and there is no loss.  Every day, from the time the sun first comes up, she heads for her fields where she fertilizes, prunes and irrigates.  Sometimes she cares for other people's crops for which they pay her a little more and she is able to provide financial support to her family who need it so badly.  Every harvest time, Angelina travels to the city of Huancayo together with her husband who sells the crops in the main wholesale market.  Angelina's husband works as a laborer on other people's crops too and thereby earns extra money.  The couple are planning to start out in business buying and selling animals.

Angelina belongs to the "Jatumpampa al Progreso" community bank and this is her third loan from MFP.  She hopes to receive your cooperation so that she can carry out her plans.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  She enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.  With your support, Angelina will invest the money she has requested in buying natural fertilizers to spread over her "blanca" and "Huairo" potato crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers

loans.name: Notilde

texts.es:
Notilde, de 39 años es una mujer humilde. Vive en compañía de Luciano, su esposo desde hace 13 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, todos ellos menores a los cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jatumpampa. Tiene mucha experiencia en la siembra de papa, olluco y alverja. Los cuales realiza en terrenos alquilados, puesto que no cuenta con unos propios. “Tengo muchos gastos, mis hijos son todavía pequeños, por eso no puedo ahorrar”, menciona. Pero trabaja con mucho esmero, siembra en grandes parcelas y siempre está al cuidado de sus sembríos, extrae la maleza que crece de entre los cultivos y fertiliza constantemente con el objetivo de mantenerlos saludables. Ya tiene 12 años de experiencia vendiendo su cosecha en la capital del país, según cuenta su esposo viaja cada mes con un camión que alquila, de esa manera se asegura que los comerciantes le ofrezcan un precio justo. Asimismo se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como ovejas y cerdos; los que engorda para luego venderlos a un mayor precio. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está feliz de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, para avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Notilde de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
Notilde is 39 years old and is a humble woman. She lives with her husband, Luciano, whom she has been married to for 13 years. Together they have 3 children, all of which are minors and live at home with them. They own their own home which is located in Jatumpampa. She has a lot of experience planting potatoes, root vegetables and peas. She plants in rented land, because they do not have their own property. She said, " I have many expenses, my children are still small and for this reason I cannot save money.". She works with great care, planting on large plots of land and always caring for her crops. She removes the weeds that grow in between her plants and fertilizes constantly to maintain her crops health. 

She has twelve years of experience selling her crops in the capital of the country. Each month her husband drives to the capital with a rented truck, in order to be sure that the buyers are offering a fair price.  

She also makes a living raising small animals like sheep and pigs. She fattens the animals so that she can later sell them for a better price. 

She is a member of the communal bank “Jatumpampa al Progreso” and this is the fourth loan she has taken out with MFP. She is happy to know that she has financial support from these organizations, to be able to advance her business. She promises once again to make her payments on time. She is happy to be a part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible people and united. 

Notilde, with your support, will invest the money she is requesting in buying natural fertilizers which she will scatter amongst her potato crop.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina de 34 años, es una mujer tímida. Vive en compañía de Eduardo, su esposo desde hace 12 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos todos menores. A los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jatumpampa. Todos la conocen por su trabajo y dedicación. Su principal actividad económica se centra en la siembra de papa y olluco en grandes cantidades, ya tienen 10 años de experiencia, en todo este tiempo logró obtener sus propios terrenos agrícolas, en donde trabaja sin descanso junto a su esposo. Le agrada mucho vivir en el campo, por eso desde que comenzó a ser campesina disfrutó del trabajo, “a pesar de ser cansado”, refiere. La papa que produce es muy buena, por eso en cada cosecha los comerciantes mayoristas visitan sus terrenos y compran sus cosechas integras, los que son trasladados a la capital del país. Pero no solo a eso se dedica Paulina, ella también tienen 6 ovejas y 4 vacas lecheras con las que elabora queso por moldes, que los comercializa cada semana en la feria que se realiza en la ciudad de Pampas. Ahora planea comprar más vacas y tener un establo grande, con animales de calidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Jatumpampa al progreso” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde está feliz de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, para avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Paulina de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa y maíz.
texts.en:
Paulina is 34 years old and a shy woman. She lives with her husband, Eduardo, whom she has been married to for 12 years. Together they have 4 young children. All of their children live with them, in their own house which is located in Jatumpampa. She is well known for being a dedicated, hard worker. 

Her main income generating activity is planting potatoes and root vegetables in large quantities. She has 10 years of experience in this type of work. During this time she has succeeded in buying her own land to plant on. She works the land, with her husband at her side, without rest. She enjoys living rurally and for this reason since she became a farmer she has enjoyed the work, "despite being tired" she said. 

The potato that she plants is of high quality and because of this during each harvest the wholesale buyers visit their land and buy their whole harvest. The potatoes are then transported to the capital.  

But this is not the only activity she does that generates income. She also has 6 sheep and 4 milk cows. She uses the milk to make cheese, which she sells in the weekly market in the city of Pampas. Now she is planning on buying more cows and having a large barn, with quality animals. 

She is a member of the communal bank “Jatumpampa al Progreso” and this it the fourth loan she has taken out through MFP. She is happy to know she has financial support to be able to advance her business. On the other hand she promises to make her payments on time. She is happy to be a part of her association because all of the members are responsible people and well united. 

Paulina, with your support, will invest the money she is requesting to buy natural fertilizers to scatter in her crops of potato and corn.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix, de 68 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de Juana, su esposa desde hace 46 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos todos ellos mayores e independientes. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de Chupaca. A pesar de su avanzada edad él trabaja para salir adelante, pues cuida a su hija Liz que es madre soltera. Su principal actividad agrícola se centra en el sembrío de zanahoria, coliflor, maíz y papa, los que cuida con mucha dedicación. En sus 40 años de experiencia, pudo obtener su casa y sus terrenos agrícolas, se siente dichoso, ya que tendrá herencia para dejarle a sus hijos cuando ya no este con ellos. Cuenta que antes viajaba a la capital a comercializar sus productos, pero como ya no cuenta con las mismas fuerzas de antes, solo lo comercializa en el mercado de la ciudad. Eso no le afecta mucho, pues también se dedica a la crianza de 7 vacas lecheras, que le brindan 70 litros de leche fresca, que comercializa a un acopiador, que vende a las fábricas. De esa manera puede obtener más ganancias. Ahora desea abrir un negocio estable, para poder vivir tranquilo con su esposa e hija. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “chamblachaca” y este es el décimo octavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, pues le agrada ser parte de su asociación.
Félix de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de zanahoria, apio y coliflor.
texts.en:
68-year-old Félix is a responsible man.  He lives together with Juana, his wife for the past 46 years.  The couple have 6 children who are all grown up and live independently.  Félix and his wife live together in their own home which is located in the town of Chupaca.  In spite of his age, Félix works in order to provide for his family because he cares for his daughter Liz who is a single mother.  His main business activity is farming and he mainly grows carrots, cauliflower, corn and potatoes.  He gives his plants a lot of care and attention.  With 40 years experience, Félix was able to obtain his own home and his own farmland.  He feels lucky as he will have an inheritance to leave his children when he is no longer with them.  He tells us that he used to travel to the capital to sell his products but, as he no longer has the strength he used to have, he now only sells them in the town market.  This doesn't affect him much as he also has 7 dairy cows which provide him with 70 liters of fresh milk which he sells to a middleman who then sells it to the factories.  In this way, he is able to make more profits.  Félix would like to open a stable business so that he can live peacefully together with his wife and daughter.

Félix is a member of the "Chamblachaca" community bank and this is his 18th loan from MFP.  He hopes to receive a small loan so that he can achieve his aims.  He pledges to make his repayments on time as he enjoys belonging to his community bank.  With your support, he will invest the money that he has requested in buying natural fertilizers to spread over his carrot, celery and cauliflower crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizers

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, de 38 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de Bertha, su esposa desde hace 20 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de Chupaca. Desde niño aprendió a sembrar y criar animales. De ahí decidió estudiar agropecuaria en una reconocida universidad. Sus estudios lo pago gracias a su trabajo, pues desde que tenía 16 años comenzó a sembrar toda variedad de hortalizas de raíz, como veterana, zanahoria y de flor, como coliflor, alcachofa y brócoli, es especialista en ello. Sus cosechas los comercializan en el mercado de la ciudad. Pero la actividad que más le gusta es la crianza de cuyes, cuenta con 500 ejemplares, su secreto es el manejo de posas, las que separa de acuerdo a la edad y parentesco, cuenta que cada 3 meses aumenta el número de animales. La alimentación de sus cuyes se basa en alfalfa que el mismo siembra, por ello tienen un alto valor nutritivo. Ya lo conocen y constantemente sus clientes le solicitan para vender o comer. Su plan a corto plazo es comprar un cuy de raza macho con 10 hembras para comenzar a criar animales de mayor calidad. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “chamblachaca” y este es el décimo séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para lograr sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual en sus cuotas, pues le agrada ser parte de su asociación. Jesús de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes para esparcir entre sus cultivos de zanahoria y alfalfa.
texts.en:
38-year-old Jesús is a hard-working man.  He lives together with Bertha, his wife of 20 years.  The couple have three dependent children who they care for in their own home, in the town of Chupaca.  Jesús learned to sow crops and raise animals from a young age and so decided to study agriculture and livestock farming at a well-known university.  He paid for his own studies through his work as he started work at 16, sowing root vegetables such as carrots and flowering vegetables such as cauliflower, artichokes and broccoli.  He is a specialist in this.  He sells his harvests in the town market.  However, the activity that Jesús enjoys the most is raising guinea pigs.  He has 500 animals and his secret is how he handles their stalls.  He separates the animals according to their age and kin.  He says that he increases the number of animals every three months.  He feeds his guinea pigs alfalfa which he grows himself and so it has high nutritional value.  His customers know him and are constantly requesting animals from him to sell or to eat.  His short-term plan is to buy a good breed of male guinea pig and 10 females so that he can start raising better quality animals.

Jesús belongs to the "Chamblachaca" community bank and this is his 17th loan from MFP.  He hopes to receive a small loan to achieve his aims.  For his part, he pledges to be punctual in making his loan repayments as he enjoys being a member of his community bank.  With your support, Jesús will invest the money he has requested in buying fertilizers to spread over his carrot and alfalfa crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural fertilizers

loans.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice lives in Yambio. She is a charcoal seller, and has been in business for five years. She is 30, married, and has two children between the ages of 7 and 3. One of them are still in school. 

Loice heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay for school fees.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale

loans.name: Astou

texts.fr: Astou est une vendeuse de vêtements, de tissus divers et d'encens.Depuis la maladie de son père qui est resté longtemps alité, elle a arrêté son commerce.Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Afin de relancer son activité, elle sollicite un pret de 500000f pour acheter des habits pour homme et dame.Son ambition est d'implanter un magasin devant son domicile.
texts.en: Astou sells clothing, different fabrics and incense. She had to stop selling clothes since her father has been sick and bed ridden. She is married and the mother of four children. She is requesting a 500,000 cfa franc loan to purchase men and women's clothing to get the business going again. Her goal is to establish a store in front of her house.

loans.use: to purchase women and men's clothing.

loans.name: Mardonkul

texts.ru: Мардонкул берет кредит для приобретения досок.
texts.en: Mardonkul is requesting this loan to purchase wood planks.

loans.use: to purchase wood planks

loans.name: Teimuraz

texts.en:
Teimuraz is 47 years old. He lives in the village of Kuturi, West Georgia, with his wife, Nona, and their three sons (18, 17 and 7 years old). The children go to school. Nona works as a cleaner at the village canteen. Teimuraz is leading the agricultural business of the family. The family has a milk cow. They produce on average 20 kg of cheese per month. They also have a vineyard with 200 vine trees. Teimuraz produces vine and vodka. He sells the drinks, as well as produces cheese at a local open market. 

Teimuraz owns a tractor. He works with it on road construction in his district. During the winter season he works on cleaning the roads from snow. For this work he is paid by the local government. 

Teimuraz requested credit to fix the engine of the tractor, as the engine is out of order at the moment. After the renovation, Teimuraz will be able to continue working on the tractor and get income. He will use it for the wellbeing of his family members.

loans.use: to pay to fix the engine of the tractor

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is a 29-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of one child, aged three years. She has been running a chemist shop for the past two years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to cater to her child’s basic needs.

She is applying for his first loan term with KADET LTD after being introduced to it by an existing KADET customer. Caroline will use the loan to buy more drugs for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her child. Her hope and dream is to open a retail shop.

loans.use: to buy more drugs for her business

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr:
Komlan est un homme âgé de 30ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants.
Komlan travaille comme coiffeur et revendeur de maillot depuis 2008. Il exerce son activité dans un quartier de la place et achète ses produits au Grand Marché de Lomé.
Komlan a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des fauteuils roulants, 1 miroir et des maillots de bain. Il veut renforcer son activité dans la vente  de maillots.
texts.en:
Komlan is 30 years old. He is single and does not have children.
Komlan has been working as a barber and reseller of clothing since 2008. He has a business near the main square and purchases his products at the Grande Marche in Lome.
Komlan has requested his second loan from WAGES in order to purchase wheelchairs, a mirror and swimsuits. He would like to strengthen his business by selling the swimsuits.

loans.use: to purchase swimsuits.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary lives in the Airport community, is 49 years old, and married with five children between 13 and 29 years old. For the past ten years she has been selling charcoal in her community. Mary says she spends most of her time with her business since her business is in her community. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and the biggest problem she faced is the transportation costs. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her business

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a 45-year-old mother of six children aged 28, 26, 24, 17, 11 and seven years. She has been selling fish for the past 17 years and earns a monthly income of KES 12,000.

She has requested a loan worth KES 20,000 to purchase more fish for sale. The profit she will receive will help her repay her loan. This is her first loan.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for sale

loans.name: Oumykhaïry

texts.fr: Oumy est une femme mariée qui exerce l'activité de commerce.Elle a récemment racheté une boutique de vente de produits cosmétiques en centre ville.Elle fait également de l'aviculture à domicile.Elle est mariée et mère de 3 enfants dont les 2 sont des élèves.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 300000f pour acheter des produits cosmétiques. Son ambition est de faire un jour du commerce en gros.
texts.en: Oumy is married and runs her own business. She has recently purchased a small store in the center of town that sells cosmetics. She also raises chickens at her home. She is married and has three children, with two in school. To strengthen her business capital, she is requesting a 300,000 cfa francs loan to purchase cosmetics. Her goal is to one day be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Paytsar

texts.en:
Now Paytsar sells fruits and vegetables from a stall near her house. Besides trading, Paytsar and her family are now engaged in animal breeding; they have bought some cows, calves and pigs. Paytsar’s mother-in-law produces cheese and other dairy produce, which Paytsar sells from her stall. Paytsar’s family sells meat to butchers. Paytsar says that thanks to their new occupation their family’s income has been grown. 
With her previous Kiva loan, Paytsar spent it to buy various fruits and vegetables to resell. Now she is asking for a 1,100,000 AMD loan to buy large lot of fodder for her farm animals and also to reconstruct her family's half-built cattle shed.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of fodder for her farm animals and to reconstruct her family's half-built cattle shed

loans.name: Dieu Merci Plus Group

texts.en:
Odon, aged 45, is the leader of the community bank named “Dieu Merci Plus”, which is composed of 12 members united in solidarity to receive loans from the MFI (micro-finance institution) HOPE DRC in order to develop their businesses.

Odon started his business in 2005 of operating a general store. Today, he sells miscellaneous items in the northeastern part of Kinshasa. He is a loyal client of the MFI HOPE DRC and has already received eight different loans and has repaid them properly. He intends to use the next loan to increase the inventory of his business by buying the items needed for his customers in his area to resell with the aim of increasing his profits. Each week, his business brings in a profit of US$90. 

His ambition is to expand his business by opening a large general store. Odon is married and the father of five children, who are aged between 2 weeks and 11 years old. Two of them go to school.

loans.use: to increase the inventory of his business by buying the items needed for his customers

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Siah

texts.en: Siah is 35 years old and lives in the Airport community. She is married with four children aged 6 to 17, who are in school and live at home. For the past two years she has been involved in the cold water and ice business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more sags of water and ice for her business. In the future she wants to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more water and ice for her business

loans.name: Aurore Plus Group

texts.en:
Jean joined one of Hope’s groups (a DRCongo Microfinance program) named “Aurore Plus” in September 2008 and he is the chairman of that group, which consists of 28 members. Thanks to Hope’s loans, the group members’ businesses have prospered. 

Jean is 42 years old, married, and the father of four children aged between 3 and 14. He has been active in his business since 2005. He runs a sewing workshop to the west of Kinshasa. Jean is dedicated to his business, which generates a profit of $160 per month. His business is the only resource of income he has to support his family. Jean has already received and successfully repaid nine loans. He is planning with the coming loan to purchase two rolls of good-quality fabric that are needed by his clients in order to generate more profit. His ambition is to open a larger sewing workshop in his environment.

loans.use: to buy two rolls of good-quality fabric that is needed by his customers

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Ndéye Khoudia

texts.fr: Ndéye est une femme mariée, mère de 3 enfants qui vont tous à l'école.Elle fait un commerce de chaussures, de tissus et de lait de beauté.Elle vend aussi des jus de fruits biologique et de la glace.Cette diversité d'activité lui permet de générer des revenus assez existentiels qui lui permettent de subvenir à ses propres besoins et à ceux de sa famille. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter des chaussures et des tissus. Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en:
Ndéye is a married woman and the mother of three children, who are all in school. She does commerce in shoes, cloth, and skin lotions. She also sells organic fruit juices and ice. This diversity in businesses enables her to generate revenues substantial enough for her to support herself and her family. 

To bolster her business capital, Ndéye is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy shoes and cloth. Her ambition is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buys footwear and fabrics

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 37-year-old businessman. He is married to Selipha, a business lady. They are blessed with three children. He has been running a retail shop for the past two years with a monthly income of KES 9,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for her second loan term with KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Francis will use the loan to buy stock of sugar, rice and maize meal for his business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hope and dream is to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy stock of sugar, rice and maize meal for his business

loans.name: Farid

texts.en:
Farid is 23 years old and runs a cafeteria in Mombasa town. He is single and has been operating the restaurant for the past two years with success. 

This marks his first loan from KADET LTD. He plans to purchase assorted drinks and foodstuffs. He hopes to make some profits, which he plans to use to expand his restaurant further. 

He dreams of a bigger, more profitable business.

loans.use: to purchase assorted drinks and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is 48 years old and she lives in the Airport community. She stopped her education in 9th grade. She is married with eight children aged between 15 to 29 years old. For the past ten years she has been selling rice, oil, pepper and many others items. She received money from her husband to start her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice, oil, pepper, and many other items for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, pepper, and many other items for her business

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana se dedica a la producción de leche y también a la venta de carne de cerdo.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de dos vacas lecheras de raza mejorada para aumentar su producción de leche y de esta forma obtener más ingresos para mantener a su familia.
Juana es soltera, no tiene hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres en Kallutaca, provincia Ticuyo ubicada en el departamento de La Paz.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Sra. Juana produces milk and also sells pork. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy two dairy cows of improved breed so that she can increase milk production. This will enable her to generate more income so that she can support her family.

Juana is single and has no children. She lives at her parents’ home in Kallutaca in Ticuyo Province, which is located in the Department of La Paz. This is the third time she has worked with IMPRO and the second time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Gafurchon

texts.ru: Гафурчон парень 20ти лет, не женат, живёт вместе с мамой и братом. Два года назад умер его отец, который работал дальнобойщиком, поэтому вся обуза семьи лежит на плечах Гафурчона. Раньше куплей и продажей скота занимался его отец, а Гафурчон всегда помогал отцу в его бизнесе. Они ездили на воскресные базары и перепродавали скот. После смерти отца Гафурчон продолжает дело своего отца, и на полученный кредит собирается купить четыре барана.Также кроме этого бизнеса он работает по отделке квартир, и имеет дополнительный доход, с которого он будет без проблем погашать займ.
texts.en: Gafurchon is a young man of twenty years of age, not married and lives together with his mother and brother. His father died two years ago, he was working as a truck driver and because of this the entire weight of the family is now placed on Gafurchon's shoulders. His father was buying and selling cattle before and Gafurchon helped his father in the business. On Sundays they went to the markets and resold the cattle. After his father's death Gafurchon continues his father's business and wants to buy four sheep on the received loan. He also does renovation of apartments besides this business and has an additional source of income which he will use to repay the loan.

loans.use: to purchase four sheep.

loans.name: Teimuraz

texts.en:
Teimuraz is from the village Chibati in west Georgia. He is 42 years old, unmarried and lives with his parents. He is the only income provider in the family. 

The family owns two milk cows and four calves. Teimuraz and his mother produce on average 40 kilograms [about 88 pounds] of cheese per month. Also the family owns two hectare [about 200 acres] of land where maize, soybeans and nut trees are grown. Teimuraz sells harvested products as well as cheese at a local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 450 Laris, including the monthly pensions of Teimuraz's parents.

Teimuraz requested credit for renting a tractor for tilling the plot of land. After properly performed seasonal work, he can count on a good harvest in the summer, which will be sold for a good price; the family will get their planned amount of income. Teimuraz plans to reinvest the income in further developing the family business.

loans.use: to pay for land tilling services.

loans.name: Millicent

texts.en: Millicent is a 43-year-old married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 16 years to 21 years. She describes herself to be a patient, diligent, courageous and God-fearing woman. She operates a retail tailoring business where she sells clothes and table cloths. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in a convenient area and her primary customers are new and frequent. She describes her biggest business challenges to be the delay of payments from customers and insufficient funds for improving the tailoring business. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase clothing materials. Her business goal is to run several similar outlets within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy clothing materials for making clothes

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a 35-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of two children. She has been selling secondhand clothes for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced to it by an existing KADET customer. Janet will use the loan to buy stock of clothes. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to rent a house and sell her clothes without walking around.

loans.use: to buy stock of clothes for sale

loans.name: Kisio

texts.en:
Kisio is a 23-year-old business lady. She is a single mother of three children. She has been running a green grocer business for the past four years with a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan term with KADET LTD after being introduced to it by a KADET staff member. Kisio will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop and continue with the grocery business.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Air port yambio. She is a charcoal seller and has been in business for two years. She is 37, married and has five children between the ages of 4 and 18; all of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Mekelina

texts.en:
Mekelina lives in Yambio. She is a food stall seller, and has been in business for six years. She is married and has five children between the ages of 1 and 15 years. Four of them are still in school. 

Mekelina heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1,000 SDG in order to purchase beans and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase onions and beans for sale

loans.name: Ahichatou

texts.fr:
Ahichatou est une femme âgé(e) de 28 ans. Elle est mariée å un  chauffeur de camion et a 02 enfants.
Ahichatou travaille comme revendeuse de charbons de bois 2005. Elle vend dans un quartier de la place et achète à Tchamba(une localité située au centre du pays environ 400Km de la ville de Lomé).
Ahichatou a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises.
texts.en:
Ahichatou is a 28 year old woman.  She is married to a truck driver and has two children.
Ahichatou has been selling charcoal since 2005.  She sells in her district and buys her supplies in Tchamba (a town located in the center of the country about 400 km from the city of Lomé).
Ahichatou has taken out her first loan through WAGES in order to buy more merchandise.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is a 70-year-old married man. He has two children who are 16 and 19 years old. He describes himself as hardworking. 

He operates a farm where he sells cows and goats. He has been involved in this business for 17 years. His business is located in a viable area and his primary customers are men. In addition, he also does farming to increase his income. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the 20000 KES loan to purchase cows to sell. Daniel's business goal is to have a variety of animals within five years.

loans.use: to buy cows to sell.

loans.name: Wilmore Antonio

texts.es: Wilmore Antonio es un emprendedor que toda su vida ha luchado por seguir sus sueños y cumplirlos, uno de ellos era de tener su propio negocio lo cual lo ha cumplido para apoyar a su familia y llevar el pan de cada día. Wilmore es cliente de Fundación León 2000, lo cual en el crédito anterior otorgado lo invirtió en el negocio de la compra de capital trabajo y así ofrecerle a sus cliente. Actualmente el emprendedor está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de llantas, espejos, tapizado, radios, lubricantes entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Wilmore Antonio is an entrepreneur who has tried his entire life to follow and fulfill his dreams. One of them was to have his own business so that he could support his family and provide for their daily needs.

Wilmore is a client of Fundación León 2000. His previous loan was invested in his business in order to build up operating capital. This enabled him to offer products to his customers. This entrepreneur is currently requesting a loan to buy tires, mirrors, upholstery, radios, lubricants, and other products.

loans.use: to buy tires, mirrors, upholstery, radios, lubricants, and other products.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Néstor, es maestro albañil y realiza todo tipo de construcciones en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de dos computadoras y el pago de pensiones de los estudios de sus hijos.
El es casado y tiene dos hijos, su esposa trabaja como enfermera en la ciudad de La Paz y viven en una casa en anticretico en la zona de Pasankeri ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Néstor is a master bricklayer and performs all types of construction jobs in the city of La Paz. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two computers and pay for the expenses of his children’s education.

Néstor is married and has two children. His wife works as a nurse in the city of La Paz. They live in a rented house in the District of Pasankeri, which is located in the city of La Paz.

This is the second time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy two computers and pay for his children's educational expenses.

loans.name: Siempre Unidas Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria Felicitas tiene 30 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la zona del pinar en el distrito de Comas.
Ella forma parte del grupo "Siempre Unidas", formado por 9 socias, vecinas de la zona donde vive. Hace dos años se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de diferentes marcas y paralelamente administra el alquiler de su auto que presta servicio de taxi. Gracias a ambas actividades ha logrado adquirir sus artefactos para el hogar, mantener a sus hijos, darles lo necesario para sus estudios y sobretodo tener tranquilidad económica.
En un futuro le gustaría tener una flota de taxis.
El prestamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza para aumentar su stock.
texts.en:
Maria Felicitas is 30 years old. She has two children and she lives in the pine zone in the Comas district. 
She is a part of the “Always United” ("Siempre Unidas") group. It is composed of nine members who are neighbors in the area where she lives. For two years, she has sold different brands of beauty products. She also manages the rental of her car in order to offer taxi services. Thanks to both of these activities, she has been able to obtain fixtures for the home, to take care of her children and give them what is necessary for their studies. And more than anything, she has been able to have economic peace. 
The received loan will be invested in the purchase of beauty products to increase her inventory.

loans.use: buy wholesale beauty products for her inventory.

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a conservative person and she is unwilling to have her picture uploaded on the internet, thus the man  in the photo is her husband; Mohammad.

Maryam is a 31-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman; Jordan and a mother of two children.

Maryam is looking to improve her family's living conditions, thus she is requesting a loan of 300 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her house

loans.name: Khaleel

texts.en:
Khaleel is a 32-year-old single man from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. He sells new water filters and does maintenance if needed.

Khaleel is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to purchase more quantities of water filters for business purposes.

Khaleel is looking to opening new branches for his store.

loans.use: To purchase more water filters for his business

loans.name: Teresa Luz

texts.es: Teresa Luz, la actividad a la que se dedica es a una  pulpería ya tiene años de tener el negocio en su casa de habitación donde atiende a sus clientes con variedad de productos. Teresa es una emprendedora que toda su vida a luchado por salir adelante, ella es clienta de Fundación León 2000 lo cual con el crédito otorgado anteriormente se abasteció de productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes que la mayoría de ellos son vecinos de la localidad y otros son eventuales que la visitan. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para comprar granos básicos, golosinas, jabón, detergente, pasta dental, huevos, entre otros productos que solicitan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Teresa Luz has managed a grocery store for many years. Her business is located in her home and she serves her customers by providing them a variety of products. Teresa is an entrepreneur and has strived all of her life to move forward.

She is a client of Fundación León 2000. With her previous loan, she was able to restock with products to offer to her customers, most of whom are neighbors in her town. Others visit her at any time. Teresa is currently requesting a loan to buy basic grains, candy, soap, detergent, toothpaste, eggs, and other products requested by her customers.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candy, soap, detergent, toothpaste, eggs, and other products.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha de 42 años, es una mujer casada. Tiene 2 hijos de 18 y 9 años. Martha y su familia viven en una casa propia en la localidad de Puente Kimiri, en el distrito de Chanchamayo. Martha, mujer con temple triunfador, se dedica a la agricultura hace 20 años, desde que unió su vida a su esposo. Ahora cuenta con experiencia en su trabajo, por eso cultiva piñas en 6 cuadras y plátanos en 1. Las piñas es un negocio rentable y sus cosechas son anuales. Actualmente piensa  sembrar de café, por eso debe esforzarse en el arduo trabaja que significa podar, pozear, cultivar, limpiar y cosechar el café.  A su vez trabaja como personal administrativo en una institución educativa, pero admite que el trabajo del campo es lo que más le gusta realizar.  
Con la ayuda de su hijo mayor puede agilizar sus labores y ahorrar en el pago de personal, pero cuando el trabajo es mas intenso, por ejemplo en días de cosechas, tiene que contratar operarios.
Ella espera, que su nueva siembra de café sea exitosa, para eso luchará como es debido. Sería la primera vez que, Martha accedería a un préstamo de MFP. Por eso se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. “Virgen del Carmen” es el nombre de su reciente banco comunal, se siente entusiasmada de ser parte de él. Invertirá el dinero en la compra de 1000 plantas de café, cada una cuesta 20 céntimos, con ello iniciará su siembra de 2 cuadras.
texts.en:
Martha is a 42-year-old married woman.  She has two children, ages 18 and 9.  Martha and her family live in their own house in the community of Puente Kimiri, in the district of Chanchamayo.  Martha, a woman with a winning temper, has worked in agriculture for 20 years, since she joined her life to her husband.  Now she has experience in her job, so she grows pineapples on six "cuadras" [a "cuadra" is approximately 1.5 acres] and bananas on one.  The pineapples are a profitable business and her harvests are annual.

Currently she plans to grow coffee, so she needs to make the effort in the hard work that is pruning, irrigating, growing, weeding, and harvesting the coffee.  She also works as administrative staff in an educational institution, but admits that the farming is what she most likes to do.  With the help of her oldest son she is able to speed up her work and save on paying personnel, but when the work is more intense, for example during the harvest, she has to hire workers.

She hopes that her new coffee crop will be successful.  She will fight for this, as is proper.  This would be the first time that Martha would get a loan from MFP.  This is why she promises to be punctual in making her monthly payments.  Virgen del Carmen is the name of her recent communal bank.  She feels enthusiastic about being part of it.

She will invest the money to buy 1000 coffee plants, each one of which costs 20 Peruvian cents.  With this she will begin her planting of two "cuadras."

loans.use: to buy one thousand coffee plants.

loans.name: Khalid

texts.en:
Khalid is a 33-year-old married man and a father of four children who lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been operating a wedding shop for three years and has gained many customers.

Khalid started his business with limited capital which qualified him to open a wedding shop. His business is operating well in wedding seasons, mostly  in summer where more customers come to buy the requirements for a wedding such as sofas, curtains and roses.

He wants to increase his working capital so as to expand his sales volume. It is a beneficial and important thing for his business future, therefore, he obtained a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB which will be used to purchase more wedding requirements like  sofas, curtains and roses in order to meet his customer`s needs.

In the future, he hopes to expand his business in order to buy a big plot of land and then use it as a wedding hall.

loans.use: to purchase  wedding requirements like  sofas, curtains and roses for his business.

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршед проживает в городе Душанбе. Он женат. Ему 23 года. У него один ребенок. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он имеет средне – специальное образование. По специальности он программист. Уже два года как он предоставляет услугу, он занимается монтажом и записью с кассет на диски. Кредит берет для приобретения принтера и покупки красок.
texts.en: Khurshed is 23 years old and lives in Dushanbe. He is married with one child and his wife is a homemaker. Khurshed completed specialized secondary education and was trained to be a programmer. For two years, he has provided computer services including montage/editing and transfer of cassettes to disk format. He is taking out a loan to purchase a printer and ink.

loans.use: to purchase a printer and ink

loans.name: Ben

texts.en: Ben is 48 years old and married. He is a fishmonger and has been in business for eight years. He faces price fluctuations and inadequate capital as challenges. His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house. He hopes to expand his business to new markets and move to a more permanent location. Ben wants to use the loan to buy fish for resale.

loans.use: to buy fish for selling.

loans.name: Phares

texts.en:
Phares is 60 years old. A mixed crop farmer, he is married to Mary, also a farmer. They are blessed with three children. He has been in the farming business for the past three years with the monthly income of KES 10,000 which he uses to support his family.


He is applying for his second loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully. Phares will use the loan to buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. 


With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to venture into pig rearing which will help him improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: To buy seedlings and fertilizer for his farm

loans.name: Abdulbako

texts.ru: Абдулбако женат и ответственный четверых детей. Он  занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Более 10 лет в этой сфере бизнеса, а также продает мясо. Сам является владельцем бизнеса. В неделю закупает 8-9 голов крупного рогатого скота и из них 3-4 голов продает, как мясо. Бизнес хорошо налажен, имеет постоянных клиентов , которые из дома забирают товар. Абдулбако запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения товарооборота.
texts.en: Abdulbako is married and is a responsible father to four children. He in business buying and re-selling livestock. He has been working in this area for ten years and also sells meat. Abdulbako owns his own business. In a given week he buys 8 or 9 head of cattle and sells about 3 or 4 of them for meat. His business is well established, with a steady stream of clients that collect their purchases from him at home. Abdulbako has requested a loan to purchase more cattle in order to increase the turnover of his business.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд проживает в городе Исфара. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него одного ребенка. Махмуд предоставляет услугу. Он занимается ремонтом машин. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для приобретения необходимых запчастей и инструментов.
texts.en: Mahmud lives in the city of Isfara. He is 37 years old and married with one child. Mahmud has been in business providing car repair services for five years. He is taking out a loan to purchase needed spare parts and tools.

loans.use: to purchase needed spare parts and tools

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is from the village of Didi Jikhaishi. He is 66 years old, married and lives with his family: his wife Ketevan, his 38-years-ld son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren (4 and 2 years old). All adult family members are involved in their agricultural business. They have a dairy farm with eight milk cows. Ketevan produces cheese and sells it locally. Also the family owns three hectares of land, where maize and grape vines are grown. Harvested products are sold locally. Total average monthly income of the family is 900 Laris, including the pensions of Omar and Ketevan. 

Omar requested credit for renting a tractor, which will till the plot. After properly done seasonal work, Omar will get a good harvest, which will be sold for an appropriate price. The family will get good income and they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for land tilling service

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
Wilson, se dedica  al comercio de útiles escolares y material de escritorio el cual lo vende en su librería.
El crédito lo requiere para el techado del garaje de su vivienda y de esta forma cubrir la pequeña movilidad de su propiedad y utilizar parte del garage para guardar cosas.
Wilson es soltero y no tiene hijos, el vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona de Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez que trabaja con KIVA.
texts.en:
Wilson is a merchant who sells school supplies and writing materials in his bookstore. The loan he is requesting is for the roof of the garage in his home so that he can cover the small vehicle that he owns. He will also use the garage for storing his things.

Wilson is single and has no children. He lives at his parents’ house in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz. This is the second time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for materials and labor in order to install a roof over his garage.

loans.name: Inoyatkhon

texts.ru: Иноятхон замужем и любящая мать двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Муж работает парикмахером. Более 14 лет она занимается купле продажей детской одежды и обуви. Она  арендовала магазин на центральном рынке города. Иноятхон хотела бы получить займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки сезонной одежды с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Inoyatkhon is married and is a loving mother of two children. She is a very hardworking and conscientious woman. Her husband is a barber. For over 14 years, Inoyatkhon has been in business selling childrens' clothing and shoes. She rents a store in the central market in her city. Inoyatkhon has requested a loan of 7000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase seasonal clothing with the goal of expanding her business.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Mustakimbek

texts.ru: Мустакимбек женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и старательный человек. Более 3 лет он занимается купле- продажей кураги. Жена занимается домохозяйством. В бизнесе занимается один. Имеет несколько постоянных покупателей. Мустакимбек запрашивает займ для покупки кураги с целью увлечения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Mustakimbek is married and is a responsible father to his two children. He is a very hardworking and assiduous person. For more than three years he has been selling dried apricots. His wife is a homemaker. Mustakimbek works alone in his business and has several steady clients. He has requested a loan to purchase dried apricots in order to help increase his working assets. He hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to have a grand opening for her law office

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is applying for his third loan with KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. George will use the loan to purchase another quarry ground. 


With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy another quarry plot.

loans.use: to add quarry space

loans.name: Nugzar

texts.en:
Nugzar is 62 years old. He lives in the village of Ianeti, West Georgia, with his family: his wife Tamara and his 18-year-old son who goes to school. 

Agricultural business is the main source of income for the family. In particular, they run a small dairy farm with three milk cows. Tamara produces on average 50 kg of cheese per month and sells it in the village. Also, the family has a pig and they sell on average 12 piglets per year. Along with the agriculture, Nugzar works in a village grocery store as a provider and gets a monthly salary. Total average monthly income of the family is 600 Laris. 

Nugzar requested credit for initiating a new agricultural business. He plans to start up a small-scale poultry farm. Nugzar will purchase chickens, grow them and sell hens in 2-3 months. Nugzar will sell hens on the local open market. The new business initiative will increase the income of the family. They will be able to put aside some savings and renovate their house, in order to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase chickens for poultry farm

loans.name: Rozikboi

texts.ru: Розикбой женат и любящий отец троих детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Кроме скотоводство имеет дополнительный доход от переработки абрикоса. Имеет хорошую репутации среди родных и знакомых. Также он занимается предоставлением услуг плотника. Розикбой хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Rozikboi is a married, loving father of three children. For more than 10 years he has been buying and reselling livestock. His wife helps him with the business. In addition to livestock breeding he also makes some additional income processing and drying apricots. Rozikboi has a good reputation among his relatives and those who know him. He also provides his services as a carpenter. Rozikboi has requested a loan of 5000 Tajik somoni (TJS) to purchase cattle. He hopes for your kindness and assistance.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Carol Vanessa

texts.es:
